name: Lil BUB’s 10th Birthday
about: To celebrate Lil BUB’s 10th birthday, her friends have come together to raise awareness and money for earth animals in need.

nonprofits.name: Lil BUB's Big Fund
nonprofits.about: Lil BUB is a one of a kind space cat. Since landing on Earth, she's raised over $500,000 for homeless pets.

nonprofits.name: Feral Change
nonprofits.about: Registered 501(c)(3) dedicated to helping Oakland control and manage its feral and homeless cat population.

nonprofits.name: Waggle Crowdfunding for Pets
nonprofits.about: First-of-its kind life-saving platform to help pet guardians and veterinary professionals raise funds for pets in crisis.

nonprofits.name: Orphan Kitten Club
nonprofits.about: Dedicated to saving the lives of the tiniest felines.
